TextBlock.Text: YARROW: Friends, is anyone able to locate Oeno? I require her aid in investigating an issue on <color=lightblue>Ash Twin,</color> but I cannot seem to find her anywhere!
YARROW: Ah, Cycad! I must return to <color=lightblue>Ash Twin</color> now, but if you might know where Oeno is, I would greatly appreciate if you could deliver my message to her!
CYCAD: I would be happy to deliver your message, Yarrow!
CYCAD: I am sure Oeno is simply playing with the native lifeforms in the pools outside our <color=orange>mining site</color> again.
